pages.title: CMR Repair Centre
pages.postbody: CMR's Colin offers over 30 years of experience in domestic appliance repair, delivering a friendly and professional service at an affordable price. Colin's knowledge means that customers receive only the best advice about their appliance, so call today for a free repair quote on 07977 800895.

pages.title: Mates Rates Rubber And Recreation
pages.postbody:
Returning to the Pine Rivers area after an enforced 2 ½ year absence, the re-branded ‘Mates Rates’ intends to provide a range of products for domestic and commercial use The range of the top quality products selected are all from Australian Suppliers at Unbelievable prices, at or below on-line prices at a local location, so you can see, feel and touch before purchase.

This is made possible by reducing overhead and operating costs to a minimum and passing on the savings to the customer in the form of lower prices. Product ranges include popular rubber mats and matting for domestic and commercial use such as cut to length rubber seal profiles, waterproof closed cell foam strip seals of various widths & thicknesses from which to choose.

pages.postbody: The Landscaping Yard and Hardware has been servicing customers in Kallangur and all areas from the Sunshine Coast to the Gold Coast since December 1994.

pages.title: Nespresso Business Solutions
pages.address: Deer Park Court, Donnington Wood, Telford, TF2 7NB, United Kingdom
pages.postbody:
Customer satisfaction and loyalty: A positive image to convey your company values

A great cup of coffee can speak volumes. It can open a conversation, close a deal and make employees and customers feel special.

Our research* has revealed that 8 out of 10 customers believe that a company that serves Nespresso cares about quality, customers and attention to detail.
